__e: They say the Man With The Plan can never be killed, but Jimmy the Saint, he did it.
The ancients used to say, "A people is only as strong as the body of its leader. "
People in town... they said my dad was "different." But he wasn't.
It didn't use to mean anything to me when people told me I was beautiful - because I already knew.
And suddenly everybody was on my side and said, how I was right, to do what I did.
All my teachers said I was clever enough and suddenly, overnight, I'm your mum and I'm his mum and I'm going nowhere.
And they said that she has to go with.
People in town... they said my dad was "different." But he wasn't.
And suddenly everybody was on my side and said, how I was right, to do what I did.
O'Neil: If I was at a party, and they said, "what do you do?"
Telling me what to do. What needed to be done, and how to do it.
Everybody said, "the other guy, the other guy, the other guy." And they came to me, and I said,
But everybody said I had to stop saying that... that I had to let you go.
The more someone told him not to do something, the more he had to do it.
*Being told what to do was my life for four years...
People were telling me, "don't go to the public. "don't let this get out, because it will make the military look bad."
They're saying, "We can't find evidence that they're doing it the way that everyone thinks they're doing it so they must be doing it a different way.
and they'd be "No no no, but he's got married now and it's not the same."
Lose faith in your country, which they say is the devil.
I was young and marrying the guy that everyone said was the perfect man.
She told me she could never do what she wanted, and made out that money wasn't all it was cracked up to be.
Do you think people said it before TV?
Good God, when I think of how they said that to me... And who said it.
Yeah, I remember the Great War in 1 914... I was about your age and that's what they kept telling everyone.
